data.name: Kogarashi
data.detailed_description:
Kogarashi tells the story of Abura Akago, a fire demon that lived ignoring the ice demon Yuki Onna and her evil deeds, until one day she went too far and stole the soul of his mother. At that moment Abura Akago armed with his flaming sword decided to free the region from the evil ice spirit and her demon army.

Features


  • 3D Hack N’ Slash combat against several enemy types that will test your skills in different ways.
  • Epic battle against a unique final boss.
  • Two final attacks that will let you execute your enemies or unleash a fiery dragon that will push all foes away.
  • Beautiful frozen medieval Japanese aesthetic style, featuring an original soundtrack.
  • Optional collectibles revealing the lore of the world.



About Development


This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

data.short_description: Kogarashi is a 3D Hack N' Slash game on which you control Abura Akago, a fire demon that fights against the evil spirit Yuki Onna and her army of ice demons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
